51805.「上デキだ。実感ねえとは思うが\n 紫光石は 女神さんのとこへ捧げられたぜ。:
Great work! I know it may not feel real, but
the Purple Gem was offered to the Goddess.

51806.「さあて 次へ行くか。\n 女神さんに 祈る番だぜ。:
Well, shall we continue? It's time to pray
to the Goddess.

51808.どこからともなく 声が 聞こえてくる。: A voice can be heard echoing from afar...

51810.<center>六聖陣によって チカラを解放されし者たちが\n聖戦を戦い それぞ:
Those who had their potential released by the
Six Saints have fought in the holy war,
protecting the peace of their eras.

51811.<center>今 魔瘴が かつてない大きなうねりを見せ\nアストルティアは こ:
But now, the demon miasma has reached an
unprecedented magnitude, with Astoltia
on the brink of unprecedented turmoil.

51813.<center>解放されしチカラを奮い そなたにも\nこの大いなる聖戦に 加わっ:
I ask that you join this great holy war, using
your newly released power.

51814.<center>悪しき者たちとの戦いに身を投じ\nこの世界を守った\nかつての闘:
Just as the defenders of the past who
protected this world from evil...
